ai-patthana15.40:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.40:1.1_0: intentionally don’t give rise to a thought ...
ai-patthana15.40:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.40:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.40:3.1_0: discovered by what is undetermined and independent. Not being unexplained or unreal.
ai-patthana15.40:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
